name: Storm Sorcery
description: Your innate magic is tied to elemental air, letting you ride the winds and command the storm.

1.name: Wind Speaker
1.description: You can speak, read, and write Primordial and its dialects.

1.name: Tempestuous Magic
1.description: Immediately before or after casting a spell of 1st level or higher, use a bonus action to fly up to 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

6.name: Heart of the Storm
6.description: Gain resistance to lightning and thunder damage; when casting such spells, deal extra damage to creatures within 10 feet equal to half your sorcerer level.

6.name: Storm Guide
6.description: You can calm rain in a small area or change the direction of the wind around you.

14.name: Storm's Fury
14.description: When a creature hits you with a melee attack, use your reaction to deal lightning damage equal to your sorcerer level and possibly push it away.

18.name: Wind Soul
18.description: Gain immunity to lightning and thunder damage and a 60-foot flying speed; you can share a 30-foot flying speed with others for 1 hour.
